page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION, SEAMILL
page.content: Most people tend to include{Seamill as{West Kilbride}but it is not.Seamill got its name because of the sea (Ardneil Bay) and its mills.{Seamill {is located on the Ardrossan to Largs {road.}It has 5 hotels, 3 shops and a garage which all sit on the main road.The mill in Seamill has been used since{1940.}The duck pond once had ducks but now it has been allowed to become overun with weeds and rubbish. The mill has got a new owner. He has fenced in the mill and disallowed parking.{The mill}is beside a road which is the entrance to the car park. It is beside the burn which leads into the sea. The burn is beside the{Seamill Hydro}where there is a windsurfing club. The Glenbryde Hotel is an old mill which was turned into a hotel. The owners keep goats,chickens, hens and dogs. It is a private hotel.
